description: This video was filmed during Ronaldo’s first photo shoot so you get to see a behind the scenes view of the making of his photo shoot. This tall and lean straight young semi-pro footballer is equally confident in and out of his clothes as he strips off for the camera to reveal his toned and slightly hairy body. When his boxers come off you also get a good look at his long uncut cock, which he has no issues playing with and is soon nice and hard. You get to see him doing some various poses as he plays with himself pretty casually and with a big cheeky grin until he unloads his balls on to his abs.
title: Bonus Video of Ronaldo's 1st Solo Photo Shoot - He Strips & Shows off his Long Uncut Cock!
